website_summaries.verdict: You'll love this serum for its fresh citrus smell and blemish-reducing power.
pros: Uses a blend of incredible antioxidants like vitamins B3 and C to soothe and revitalize the skin
Helps protect skin against UV rays
cons: Skin may break out during the first few weeks of use
this is the retinol doing its job and clearing your pores

website_summaries.verdict: A popular and powerful serum that's about a third of the price of competitors.
pros: Does the standard job in brightening the skin
This formula also uses ferulic acid, hyaluronic acid, and sea buckthorn oil to support the skin’s protective barrier
cons: Some users with sensitive skin said the serum's acid made their face red

website_summaries.verdict: A popular serum made with quality ingredients and delivers notable results for many users. Fans say it's comparable to premium brands, and are pleased with the affordable price point.
pros: In addition to vitamin C, this serum is made with retinols and hyaluronic acid, which both help minimize signs of aging, and salicylic acid that targets blemishes and breakouts
Made in the U.S.A. without harsh or artificial ingredients
cons: A few formula changes don't appeal to some repeat customers
Can be irritating to very sensitive skin

customer_reviews.title: Missing ingredient in second purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This product worked well for me the first time I ordered it. I carefully read the ingredients apon receiving. Once I ordered it a second time, I noticed the product smelt, felt, and looked different. (I re-ordered the same product I had ordered in the past) when I compared the ingredients I noticed that a main ingredient (tea tree oil) was missing from the product. I felt mis lead, because expecting the product to work, look, smell the same, it did not. The manufacturer altered the ingredients for the same product I had ordered once before and it does not work the same with this very important ingredient missing from it. Won’t be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bring the old formula back!
customer_reviews.text: I used this serum religiously for several years and it used to be one of my favorite serum of all times, even when compared to more expensive products. It really helped with my breakouts and just overall changed the texture of my skin. The new formula has the opposite effect on me! It causes me to break out and I had to discontinue the product. You can tell that the overall rating for the product dropped after they introduced the new formula and a lot of people are now complaining about the same thing. I'm really sad the company had to ruin such a great thing
customer_reviews.author: Marina Vasilyeva

customer_reviews.title: Changed the formula and it’s all wrong!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying this for several years no. Originally the formula smelled pleasantly lemony then more orangey, but it still worked to clear up acne scars and reduce breakouts. The last order I had smelled so foul I asked Amazon for a replacement. Turns out they changed the formula again and this stinks. Very disappointed as I really liked this product and the effect it had on reducing breakouts, but I won’t be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Ndolin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent in every way.
customer_reviews.text: Terrific Serum, have been using this for a few years now to wonderful results. Texture is nice, and the product absorbs quickly and easily. I consistently receive compliments on my skin - my dermatologist has even asked me about this product. Sellers are friendly and care about the product. Excellent purchase, buy yours now!
customer_reviews.author: sisdisco

customer_reviews.title: Came oxidized - not usefulT
customer_reviews.text: This bottle came with a amber/brownish liquid. It was already oxidized!!! Which means it's not as potent. Tried at first to use it but obviously didn't see any results. Definitely recommend checking before using.
customer_reviews.author: Linh

customer_reviews.title: Formula change
customer_reviews.text: really disappointing. I've used this product for almost three years now and I used to swear by it but the most recent bottle I received did nothing at all. I don't know if the formula was changed or what but this current one had a VERY thin texture and did absolutely nothing at all for my skin. The previous formula, I could feel a slight tingle and would wake up with glowing skin. This one, nothing. It might as well be water. I wont order again.
customer_reviews.author: Nico Zazzaretti

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered and use a lot of products from the InstaNatural line. I appreciate the product because it is natural and organic and VERY reasonably priced. There have been times when I haven't used the products, like when I've run out and not reordered in time, and I have always been sorry! When the products come back in, I am so thankful! I use it in conjunction with the Retinol cream, and the hyaluronic serum. I find these products work best after an exfoliation. I recommend these products fully.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Aza

customer_reviews.title: Cut my fingers!!
customer_reviews.text: The product is lovely, I've only been using it a few days so haven't seen any difference, but the first time I opened it, the lip around the dropper is VERY sharp. It sliced my finger. Now, I have to remember to twist it open a certain way or it slices my finger again. I use other products that are packaged this way and none of them are sharp around the seal.
customer_reviews.author: J and L

customer_reviews.title: No effect
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this would replace the $90 Vitamin C serum I purchased through my aesthetician, but no. This had absolutely no effect on my skin. I used it for nearly two months and may as well have been rubbing water on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simply put, it works
customer_reviews.text: I just finished my first bottle and immediately purchased another. In 2 months my skin has flourished. Old dark spots that I’ve had for years have faded and the general look and feel of my skin has improved. I really like that the serum combines all of the ingredients I would normally buy separately into one super effective product. Best of all a little goes a long way so you really get bang for your buck. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Diva

customer_reviews.title: I've been using the vitamin C for a few years ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the vitamin C for a few years, and this year I got the clearing serum for my teenage daughter. She loves it! In a few years will get it for little brother too!
customer_reviews.author: gwlin

customer_reviews.title: Got a return and is different than the first one.
customer_reviews.text: I had a pretty good experience, but I gotta say, I had to return the first one since the dropper is glass and the tip was broken. Easy return, but then. I got my second product (new for the return) and it was basically the same on the outside, but the product itself was different form the first one, the color it was white and the return I got is yellow.... I don't want to be rude, but companies need to keep the product the same. So I have no idea if this one is expired, because it has no expiration date anywhere, like the first one I got and had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product! Don't believe the hype and save your money!!
customer_reviews.text: People must have been paid to write good reviews for this product. I bought this for the full price, and I did not receive any sort of discount for my feedback. I have not seen a difference and I've been using this for about a month. If anything, my face has been breaking out even more. I'm so disappointed. I contacted the company with a question and I have not heard back, so customer service gets a thumbs down for me as well. It smells good, but that's about it. Don't waste your money or believe the hype!
customer_reviews.author: bri9286

customer_reviews.title: Happy dance!
customer_reviews.text: *Update-its still a good product but not something I’m not using daily. About once a week because it was causing me to break out. Okay so I’ve been wanting to try a serum for a while now. I finally broke down and tried this one. It goes on smoothly and moisturizes beautifully. I have sensitive skin and was worried this would break me out but it hasn’t yet. I am so please. I have only been using this a few days and can already tell a difference in my skin! I’m very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Sammi

customer_reviews.title: This is wonderful and cannot go without.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this serum for menopause adult acne. It really helped me to balance my skin so my acne disappeared. I had very small acne around my chin area. This had disappeared. My daughter also uses this as well. She has had great results with her acne scars fading. Just be sure to use it daily because it really keeps your skin balanced. My skin look perfect now.
customer_reviews.author: RV

customer_reviews.title: Works !
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. I have been using it for about 10 days. I swear, my face is smoother and my wrinkles have been ironed out some! It seems unbelievable that I'd see results this quickly (I know) but I know it works. I also use a light retinol cream over the top of it. It is a bit tingly on my sensitive skin, but it calms down quickly. If you are super sensitive, you may want to try something else. At least do a patch test first before applying it to your entire face. Just good sense.
customer_reviews.author: elleemann

customer_reviews.title: So good I’ve purchased it twice within a month!
customer_reviews.text: A friend showed me this product, I had never heard of the brand or product before. It changed my life within 24 hours! I deal with awful cystic acne and in that short period of time it cleared it up and kept the blemishes away! It has also brightened my skin within weeks! I can’t stop telling people about it! It’s such a great product at a killer price! I will be buying it over and over again!
customer_reviews.author: Mara

customer_reviews.title: I think it might work...
customer_reviews.text: I breakout every single day from anything! I have been using this product for 10 days and so far I haven't broke out. I notice that I cannot use it as a spot treatment because it burns my skin ( i have extremely sensitive skin). I use it all over my face every night. I have blemishes all over my face and underneath my chin (thank God for makeup)! I think over time the blemishes will shrink and eventually diminish. I am black American.
customer_reviews.author: Ladadi_Moza

customer_reviews.title: Has opposite affect on me
customer_reviews.text: Waking up the next day after using this the first time, my face looked and felt great. Since then, using every night before bed, I now wake up to find my face all broken out. It's not minimizing my pores, my fine lines and wrinkles are not being helped, it's really not doing anything. Either this product just doesn't work despite all these rave reviews or it's not the right one for me. Past the return date so I'm stuck with it, unfortunately. Won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: mike fezatte

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I so wanted to like this but it literally made me get small white pimples all over and I never get those I get occasional acne and never like this I discontinued use yesterday and already the tiny new ones stopped forming. I don’t typically have a reaction like this to something that’s supposed to clear acne. Judging by reviews I would say try it because everyone’s skin is different I was trying to replace an expensive acne line I use and I guess I have to go back :/
customer_reviews.author: Olivia21

customer_reviews.title: Great serum, be careful of cap
customer_reviews.text: The serum itself is fantastic - my skin is brighter and my old acne scars are a lot less visible. It’s not sticky and spreads/absorbs really well. I use additional moisturizer with it as it’s not moisturizing, but it’s also not drying at all. However, the cap from this bottle needs an upgrade. I’d read reviews about potentially cutting yourself on the lip, and I can totally see how that’s possible - it’s a sharp lip. Today the outer plastic ring of the cap came off entirely. Great product for your skin, but the bottle needs some improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love InstaNaturals. I've been using this product for months and it helps with clearing up my skin. It has helped the bag under my eyes. The reason I gave it 4 stars was because the past two bottles I have recieved has a different color, smell, and feel to it. Rather than light orange like it use to be it is more pale color and doesn't smell as orange as use to.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product because it makes my skin glow and tightens it a little without it become dry. My skin is dewy and supple. My skin looks flawless and afterwards I apply a light moisturizer with sunscreen protection. It is my first time purchasing this product, but I will buy it again, and again...it also helps if you get any breakouts or the occasional pimple...I just love it!!
customer_reviews.author: N. Page

customer_reviews.title: I Love This!
customer_reviews.text: One of my best friends introduced me to this product. I was pretty skeptical because my skin is VERY sensitive. I've had some bad experiences with products giving me chemical burns. I also have allergic reactions to a lot of fragrances. I have dark spots from acne, enlarged pores and overall discoloration. But my skin is so much clearer and my pores are smaller. My dark spots are really stubborn and have started fading. It's really great! I'm really glad that I've found this brand. I'm excited to try new products.
customer_reviews.author: Kiana

customer_reviews.title: You can uncap the bottle and place it on its side without losing any product.
customer_reviews.text: The amount shown is supposed to be 1oz. but when I received the product, there was barely anything inside. There is so little inside that I can place the bottle on its side, uncapped, and nothing would come out. Probably the biggest disappointment. I've seen reviews about people using it for 3-4 months twice a day before having to buy another one, and I just don't see how that is possible given the amount each bottle, I assume, receives. I give this two stars as this is my initial reaction and have only been using the product for a few days. Hence why I cannot accurately give a review to the product itself.
customer_reviews.author: Liam

customer_reviews.title: Skin has never looked better
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite skincare product because of all of the benefits in one. I apply it at night around two drops. I have combo skin and get oily and used to suffer from under the skin kinda pimples frequently. Now my skin is a lot clearer and my acne scars have significantly diminished, I still get the occasional pimple here and there but overall I’m more confident to go in public without makeup because the overall texture and appearance and health of my face has improved greatly and I will continue to buy this product after I run out which I’ve had this for a long time and still have plenty left.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: My skin is worse now then when I started using it (about ten ...
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes but unfortunately this product just didn't work. My skin is worse now then when I started using it (about ten days ago). The acne I had won't heal or go away and every time I look in the mirror I see another one. It also makes me skin feel a bit greasy. I had to reduce how much foundation I use because my skin no longer looked healthy and the make up only enhanced that. So...guess I'll keep on looking!
customer_reviews.author: Caitrin23

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This serum completely transformed my moms skin but she’d been wanting to try out a product she’s seen on tv for years. Well she tried that product and now she wants Instanatural again, I was upset but I let her get it out of her system. As for me, I been using it for about a year now, I use it as my base for makeup and has helped with my oily skin. There’s nothing better than using natural products!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: The first tome I ordered this it was good. Did cause breakouts the first week of use. Then my skin started to clear up. It feels light weight. When I reordered, the second bottle didn’t seem the same. Still had the breakouts but a didn’t see the skin improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Great Serum
customer_reviews.text: I use this product twice daily. My skin tone has appeared to even out considerable and breakouts are minimal (this is a big improvement for me). Works well under makeup and doesn't feel greasy.
customer_reviews.author: arcanamundi

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: Kind of disappointed as I got an allergic reaction to this product. I never had any issues with the ingredients in this product. I also used a similar kind of serum before (vitamin c) and did not have any issue so I thought I would try this... I have learned my lesson now..
customer_reviews.author: AsburyNJ

customer_reviews.title: Noticeable Results
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bottle and there's a noticeable improvement in the small lines around my mouth and the dark spots on my forehead and cheeks. A few days after first using it, I developed a couple of flakey red spots on each side of my mouth. They went away after about a week and never came back. I'm very happy with the results and will continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: It WORKS.
customer_reviews.text: This product WORKS. After using for a week, my acne cleared up, and as I continue using the serum, I no longer have flare-ups. I have pretty serious hyperpigmentation, and the dark skin has been significantly lightening to the point that I no longer put heavy concealer under my makeup. My pores seem smaller too. A bottle lasts several months. I highly recommend this serum because it addresses many skin problems, especially for aging skin, and the price is unbelievable.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. M

customer_reviews.title: finally, something that works
customer_reviews.text: I bought for myself and 2 teenage boys. We have all seen a difference. I have dark spots on my neck where moles were burned off and they are already fading, plus, I swear my skin is smoother. I can't tell yet about the dark circles around my eyes, but I think that is better as well. Both boys have seen an improvement in there (admittedly mild) acne. Nothing else has ever made a difference. One boy is completely cleared up. Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: idiomas

customer_reviews.title: Great Serum
customer_reviews.text: I am very particular in what goes on my skin. Anti aging products are a must to keep the wrinkles at bay and Vitamin C is one of the essentials. This is a power house to fight aging skin.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Cremer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for a little over a month. No sensitivity noted seems all natural. Doesn’t reduce dark spots as much but good for preventing breakout.
customer_reviews.author: Nikeeta Patankar

customer_reviews.title: Clears acne and acne scars
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product since November 2019 and there is a huge difference in my acne scars and acne. I have purchased this twice. The product lasts a long time, and I will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Julie King Birmingham

customer_reviews.title: Results within two weeks
customer_reviews.text: I noticed that I have had reduced acne scarring since using this product. My skin in the morning has been smoother and felt really hydrated. The scent is really light and citrusy. It's been a couple weeks now and I will continue to use with hopes it will get even better. If I could change anything, it's that the dropper with the serum comes out kinda quick, but definitely not a deal-breaker.
customer_reviews.author: bailey

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: Buy it! I’m 27 years old and I live in a humid climate. My t zone is always oily and that’s where my breakouts happen. Usually inflamed white heads and closed comedones. My acne started getting really bad at age 24. Since then, I have tried hundreds of products with no luck. I wish I would have taken a before and after picture but my skin has never been this clear. I use La Roche Posay Effaclar medicated cleanser, paula’s choice salicylic acid toner, and then this stuff. Followed by the Neutrogena hydro boost moisturizer. I also found that limiting dairy, sugar, and quick oats from my diet has helped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this serum! I have been using it for about 8 months now. Before usage, I would get a few bumps in my T zone that turned into blemishes. I would wear makeup to cover it up. Since using the serum, my skin has definitely turned. I barely get a bump and my complexion is clear and smooth - no need for makeup anymore. I have determined that this was the product that was making the difference due to I have changed face cleansers and moisturizers, but always used this.
customer_reviews.author: krystle

customer_reviews.title: Best vit C serum so far
customer_reviews.text: It has really helped clear my blemishes and made my skin look bright and firm. I use it mostly at night but sometimes in the morning too. My advise use sunscreen!
customer_reviews.author: Ramesh Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad to know this product. I am so picky about the skincare products, and I don’t stick with the same product since it’s hard to find the right one. But the first morning I woke up after using this at night, my skin tone was bright in a vibrant healthy way which made me wonder if someone had changed a light bulb. I will definitely keep using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: A great line of products
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this beauty line for a year. I am a 58 year old woman with changing skin. Since starting this line. My face has freshened up, feels soft, and looks amazing! the products go on smoothly and cleanly No stickiness. Little scent. No staining. No stinging.
customer_reviews.author: RainNJ

customer_reviews.title: Affordable with a great combination of ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I'm 36 with lifelong mild acne and now fine lines developing around my eyes/mouth. I've used a lot of different products, and I recently bought my second bottle of this serum. I like that this has the ingredients I was previously getting between different products, so I've streamlined my routine while still getting the beneficial effects of some of the pricer serums I've purchased for $50-80/bottle.
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It took me sometime to find the right amount. This product takes just a small amount which is so different than others
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Graves

customer_reviews.title: Caused cystic acne on my oil prone t-zone
customer_reviews.text: I have combination oily/dry skin. After using this product as directed for a few weeks now, my face has been breaking out with what appears to be cystic acne. It's awful. Huge painful lumps in the T-zone area. My skin wasn't perfect to begin with, but it wasn't this bad. I have used retinol products in the past, and I realize that there is often an initial "breakout" period. But these cysts are huge, and painful. The pain isn't worth the potential gain. On the plus, the product goes on nicely. It wasn't too drying. And it smells amazing. I would have loved for it to work for me.
customer_reviews.author: MelissaLG

customer_reviews.title: It's working well so far.
customer_reviews.text: I like the serum. I have used it for approximately 15 days, morning and night. It definitely helps blemishes go away quickly and I have seen some diminishing of the hyperpigmentation from previous acne marks. I'm eager to see how much it continues to fade as that is the primary reason I purchased the serum. I would also like to see how much more of an improvement I see by adding the lotion as well.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Helps
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order and really have seen an improvement in my skin I have acne and acne scars that have cleared up. I am 47 so struggle with acne and wrinkles what the heck?? This great serum has helped with both. I forgot to take on vacation for a week and when I got home started using it again and was so convinced this was what helped my skin after a week of not using it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rupp

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product to help even skin tone. I'm ordering my 3rd bottle and skin blotches seem to be lightening. Definitely not getting worse. The lotion has all the ingredients that should help. The product has no scent and is not a really a moisturizer. I do not have sensitive skin so I don't know if this will bother you.
customer_reviews.author: VAmom

customer_reviews.title: Has side effects
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a week with a cleanser and moisturizer if the same brand. It didn’t work for me but rather made it worse for me and as an added side effect I got severe cold and flu because this serum is cold and gets absorbed in your skin. Would not recommend it if you’re not used to retinol.
customer_reviews.author: Zain syed

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 4 stars solely due to the smell. It isn't the best!!! In fact I hate it but, it wont prevent me from using it. I use this at night and have noticeably different skin in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Carrasco

customer_reviews.title: Helps clear blemishes & smooth skin!
customer_reviews.text: This product really does help clear up my skin when I have breakouts. If I apply this in the evening before bed, it calms down any redness, inflammation and my skin often looks brand new in the morning when I wake up! The only problem I have is if I apply this when my skin is already dry, I’ll wake up flaky in the morning. I believe this is expected as this product causes cell turnover, but I have learned to use this product less frequently when I have dry skin. Overall very satisfied with this product. I wish I would have found this product sooner, will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing and my skin looks brighter
customer_reviews.text: The product is very lightweight. Smells amazing and my skin looks brighter, the product helped clear our some of the dark spots caused by acne. It doesn’t cause any break outs.
customer_reviews.author: Karla S

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars!
customer_reviews.text: I actually really enjoy this serum! I notice less breakouts, and it is helping my acne marks to fade! The key to this product though, is to be consistent I have been using it for probably a month or so, every single morning and night and it has helped my skin look SO much better! I will definitely be repurchasing!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: A great find!
customer_reviews.text: What a difference! Only one week and my skin looks great! I was very skeptical about this product, but it actually does what it says. Will recommend to everyone. I tend to have oily skin which many products like this make me break out. So it’s hard for me to find the right products for my skin type. I wet my hands a bit or apply while sink is still slightly wet/moist, this helps with amount used/application as it drys fast once on the skin. Besides that, this is a 5star product!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: I've been trying the InstaNaturals products and the others that I've tried I've liked so far. I had high hopes for this serum as it's reviews are overwhelmingly positive; but sadly it failed me. I have combination acne prone skin. I tried this product on more than one occasion and it ended up breaking me out in cystic acne both times. I was hoping the first time it was due to stress, but sadly it looks like this is the culprit. Hopefully I'll have better luck with one of their other serums.
customer_reviews.author: Iz

customer_reviews.title: Not a miracle serum but good overall!
customer_reviews.text: This product was pretty good. I love how much retinol is in it, which helps with acne. It has helped mildly with my acne. While it's not a miracle serum I still enjoyed the product. I've used the serum for almost a month and from my research retinol takes a few weeks to a few months to actually work.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Long time lover of this serum
customer_reviews.text: I started using this serum when I was 24 to help with my acne, and it worked wonders. I used it in junction with a Clarisonic, oil free moisturizer, and a preliminary toner. I use the serum twice a day and refuse to ever miss an application my skin is beautiful and I will continue to use it going forward as it has already been 4 years now yikes!!! -Cheers, Kathleen
customer_reviews.author: kathleen reily

customer_reviews.title: Skin feels brighter (acne discoloration)
customer_reviews.text: I’m 32 and have scarring/discoloration from two decades of battling acne. I’ve only been using this serum for a few weeks, but I already notice the difference when I forget to use it at night. In the morning (after applying at night), I feel like my skin is brighter and more moisturized (especially after my experience using so many drying agents for acne). I’m looking forward to seeing how my skin feels a couple months from now. I also like the slight citrus scent upon application.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: This dried out my skin
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this product. However, it dried out my skin significantly. I think the combination of too many ingredients in one. Not for sensitive or dry skin, made everything worse, scaley and I was unable to wear makeup for several weeks while my skin evened out.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I order this serum for one of my client who swears by this product. I’m giving it 4 stars because I have never tried it and I don’t carry this brand in my spa. It’s a one off product that I routinely purchase for a particular client. Based on her response it’s fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: Z Beauty Day Spa

customer_reviews.title: ... whole bottle of this already but I don't feel like my skin show improvement with this serum
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the whole bottle of this already but I don't feel like my skin show improvement with this serum. To my personal, vitamin A just never really help me that much compare to vitamin C. The vitamin C serum of this line is much better for me. This serum makes me have some bump and clog my pores. It just not working for me.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but the smell isn’t the best.
customer_reviews.text: This serum has been great for evening out my skin tone and keeping dark spots from new acne from developing. I also have very oily skin around my cheeks near my nose and my forehead, but the rest of my face can get very dry. This has provided the right amount of moisture to help balance out my combo skin better than other serums or moisturizers. I don’t even use a moisturizer anymore; just this serum and a rose water spray!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: I started this about 3 weeks ago and I’m in love! My skin is brighter and clearer. It’s really hard to find Vitamin C with Retinol but this serum has it. So it’s smoothing out wrinkles too. I use it at night and noticed a difference after just a day. I’ve used products 5x more expensive and never got these results. I’m really interested in their other products and am looking forward to giving them a try. I already have a few waiting in my amazon cart.
customer_reviews.author: Fjack10

customer_reviews.title: Free bottle offer after purchase because it’s a sham?
customer_reviews.text: Like many reviewers I also started to get tiny white pimples on my face from using this product. It smells ok but nothing very luxurious and isn’t moisturizing at all. Unfortunately I didn’t see any benefits to using this product at all. The company offers a free bottle of this stuff after using it and giving a positive review to boost their sales. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Spiritous

customer_reviews.title: Usually happy with my purchase, however.............
customer_reviews.text: My skin is so happy when I use this product! It hydrates, replenishes and soothes all in one! ***Usually happy with my purchase, however.....my most recent time buying the product, the bottle arrived half empty. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... stuff congested my skin and broke me out so bad. I do not add products to my regiment ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff congested my skin and broke me out so bad. I do not add products to my regiment often and so I thought this was the cause. After I stopped using it my skinned cleared right up but now I am working getting rid of the scars. I was so mad and I threw it away. I am not sure if the reviews are real and I will do more research next.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what a serum should do!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this serum before I moisturize both day and night for two months now, and I love it! This serum is one of the best I've tried in my lifetime! There has been a significant change in my skin. No more dry patching skin in the winter, but instead my skin in soft and supple. The appearance of my skin looks healthier too! I'm 63 and loving this product. I definitely recommend it and look forward to trying more Insta Natural products.
customer_reviews.author: Medesoll

customer_reviews.title: Good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Just started using so time will tell if it is effective. No adverse or allergic reactions to product and i have very sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for clear, younger looking skin!
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin that has recently been oily and having a few random breakouts. Since switching to this serum, my skin is clear, no longer oily and looks better than it has in years! A little goes a long way, I only use once a day at bedtime.
customer_reviews.author: kait

customer_reviews.title: I like.
customer_reviews.text: I do like this product. I understand the vitamin C is added to it but I prefer the product without vitamin C. I am getting use to the product with it added. Change takes time.
customer_reviews.author: MASmith

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Keeping skin clear. Help keep it looking young Skin firm great under makeup no clump Does not irritate eye or skin and I have sensitive skin. I have no issues with this
customer_reviews.author: Verified purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Multi Benefit Product!
customer_reviews.text: I love that there are so many benefits in one bottle. Helps with acne, wrinkles and sun damage! Love the light citrus smell as well. Repeat customer here!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney G

customer_reviews.title: Best Recommendation
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine, who has similar skin, tried this product out and then referred me to it. I was more than impressed! After the first three days I could tell that my complexion was becoming more even. I wake up and my skin feels like it’s 18 years old again. I’m almost two weeks in and have that “where have you been all my life “ feeling. I have struggled for 30 years to find a decent moisturizer that doesn’t make me an oil bomb. Highly Recommended for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Weldon

customer_reviews.title: YES! A clean everyday skincare product
customer_reviews.text: My sister recommended this product for me...she uses it every day and absolutely loves it. I tried it on when I visited her and loved it as well! Going to start adding it to my daily skin routine.
customer_reviews.author: Ruvalcaba

customer_reviews.title: Huge improvement!
customer_reviews.text: I loved their vitamin C serum but I've always struggled with hormonal cystic acne. I still get flare ups every once in a while, but this has SIGNFICANTLY improved my skin. I clear up much faster from break outs and they are less often. My skin everywhere that there isn't acne is smooth, hydrated and even-toned. Once I conceal whatever acne I may have, my face looks smooth and flawless now. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product. I’ve tried many serums and this so far is the best. Great improvement and the texture of my skin, does a great job of brightening and goes on smoothly. No irritation. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Lindemann

customer_reviews.title: Amazing !
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product .i wake up and my skin is refreshed and looks great . I have tried to many products and this is the only one to help my forehead wrinkles . Really makes your skin look years younger .
customer_reviews.author: Nicole.d

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews for anything but this has improved my skin in only 3 days of use! It works better than most of my more expensive skincare options. I’ve struggled with Cystic acne a majority of my life and this leaves my skin feeling smooth after one use! I often put it on before bed.
customer_reviews.author: Madi

customer_reviews.title: All-around nice serum.
customer_reviews.text: The smell is strong, but the serum is gentle. My face looks brighter and dewier. I was hoping it would do more for my pigmentation scars, but I haven't seen much improvement. But the Vitamin C does work to give you that "glow." I have oily skin, so I also like the fact that this serum is super lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Very good product & brand.
customer_reviews.text: I have acne prone skin. Using this in the day time above toners and a lighter serum. I feel my skin tingle for a minute after application. A bit drying from retinol but i keep my skin moisturized when using this product. I use the niacinamide serum at night. Products are great.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Brightens, reduces acnes, does not lessen wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product to brighten your face and bring back healthier, acne, free skin. The product goes on easy, and you can feel the tightening. However, should be used with a moisturizer as well. Overall reduced the frequency of acne, but did not reduce any lines.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Great anti-aging and acne-fighting serum
customer_reviews.text: I have cystic acne, large pores, and fine lines on my face. The first week of using this serum, my face dried out and was a bit flaky BUT, my skin needed to adjust to the retinol and salicylic acid. This is to be expected as I use a retinol night moisturizer after the serum nightly. After the second week, my face wasn't looking nor feeling dry. It's starting to look better and I feel like I'm not looking tired like before. My cystic acne is also clearing up faster than when left alone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: ever since they changed the formula, it's not the same. bring back the old formula please!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Skin looks younger!
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from cystic acne and hyperpigmentation. Using several of your products in combination has helped diminish acne, acne spots, fine lines and wrinkles! My skin feels super hydrated and I get compliments on how bright and younger looking my skin is!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Will be buying again
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this serum for a few weeks now and like it. I have never used a serum before this, so I do not have anything to compare it to but I do love how soft my skin is. I am 31 and started using this along with a microneedle derma roller. After 2 weeks my husband said that my skin looked softer and smoother, so I’ll take that as a win for a man to notice a woman’s skin.
customer_reviews.author: Damaris Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Results in 3 days!
customer_reviews.text: I saw results in 3 days! I only use organic or natural and clean products and it’s sometimes hard to get age fighting results! Will be adding more products to my daily routine for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Star

customer_reviews.title: Great Serum!  It Really Works.
customer_reviews.text: So happy with the results of using this serum. I have been using it for about six months now and have seen a significant decrease in new blemishes! When I do get a new blemish, it is generally very small and goes away quickly; not more cystic bumps. The serum is not over drying and it absorbs very quickly. I use at night then use the retinol moisturizer in the morning. My skin hasn’t been this clear in years.
customer_reviews.author: cltbWillingham

customer_reviews.title: Locally made, all natural wonder serum
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I absolutely love this serum! Living in Florida we experience intermittent breakouts in the summer and he also has cystic acne and this serum has gotten rid of all of it. The silky texture leaves my face clean and moisturizer without being greasy. We just started using it in conjunction with the toner and it is even better! I’m a lifer and love that it is made locally in Orlando, FL with all natural ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great multi-purpose serum
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product with all the ingredients I wanted! I started using every other night and worked my way up to every night. I didn't experience any skin irritation and woke up to smooth skin every morning. After about two weeks I started to notice my breakouts were less frequent and cleared up faster. I wish knew about this sooner! I have completely switched from using my high end Sephora serums because this works just as well for a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Murray

customer_reviews.title: Dropper applicator easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Love, love this product. Great fresh scent. Absorbs in skin well. My complexion looks better.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A.Plepis

customer_reviews.title: Be patient and use faithfully!
customer_reviews.text: Stings a bit, like anything with (salicylic acid and tea tree oil) but seems helps clear blemishes. I am sticking with it, seems like overall effects take time. [I'll update my review after a 2nd bottle.]
customer_reviews.author: Rae Willow

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product...I could feel it working right away. Almost through 1 bottle and I can see difference in skin tone as well as some fine line smoothing. Definitely recommend as an alternative natural product
customer_reviews.author: mikeebeaverton

customer_reviews.title: This stuff has totally changed my skin!
customer_reviews.text: STOP WHAT YOU ARE DOING AND BUY THIS PRODUCT. Let me preface this by saying, usually, even if I like something, I rarely leave a review. I also am super nervous to try anything new on my skin because I am so sensitive and everything makes me break out. This line is a god send. I bought this, the retinol moisturizer, and the vitamin c face wash- and I am in LOVE. My skin is clearer and more moisturized than it has even been. I have received so many compliments on my skin lately- and it’s all because of this line.
customer_reviews.author: Persia etminan

customer_reviews.title: The product itself seems great so far
customer_reviews.text: The product itself seems great so far. Light and non-oily, absorbs into the skin quickly. The odor is pleasant and citrusy. However, the packaging leaves little to be desired. I really wish the company would provide this in a pump bottle. I am almost hesitant to buy again unless I can find something better to transfer it to.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie

customer_reviews.title: I can tell a difference
customer_reviews.text: Incorporated this with starting a new skin cleaning regimen and it's been three weeks using it day and night and I can say it has noticeably lightened my acne scars and has keep my acne at bay. I am still getting new acne but I can say it is much less than three weeks ago. Will be purchasing again. I would say I can go another week on the bottle I have now so to have to purchase this once a month isn't bad.
customer_reviews.author: Plays Darts for Fun

customer_reviews.title: The best face serum I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: I've always suffered from acne, and I've always struggled to find a product that keeps my skin at bay. InstaNatural's Age Defying Skin Clearing Serum is honestly amazing. I recently ran out and went (maybe) 5 days without it, my face started breaking out everywhere. My new bottle came two days ago and I can already feel a difference in my skin - I need this forever!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Tobin

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It really does make a difference. I use it nightly can tell a difference in the brightness and over all complexion.
customer_reviews.author: jtwy

customer_reviews.title: I do like how it smells though
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product now for over a month and unfortunately do not see any lightening of my blemishes/dark spots. I don't notice any change in my skin. If I place a thin layer all over my face it makes me have a breakout or two sometimes. I do like how it smells though. But I would not purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie0523

customer_reviews.title: Feels great, light
customer_reviews.text: Wanted this product to work for me so bad but it broke me out sadly. I have sensitive skin so it’s always the possibility with products. Smells nice and goes on smooth and isn’t greasy though
customer_reviews.author: Katie

product_meta.title: InstaNatural Vitamin C Anti Aging Skin Clearing Serum - Wrinkle, Cystic Acne, Fine Line, Pigmentation, Pore Minimizer & Dark Spot Corrector for Face - Retinol, Hyaluronic, & Salicylic Acid - 1oz
feature_bullets: CLEAN & CLEAR COMPLEXION- InstaNatural’s Anti Aging Skin Clearing Serum for face incorporates Salicylic Acid to soothe and clear blemishes. This anti aging serum works as a dark spot corrector for face by brightening the skin while also dueling as a pore minimizer and acne spot treatment for those pesky breakouts that pop up. By regulating oil production, a healthy complexion is revealed.

KEY INGREDIENTS - Retinol reduces the appearance of lines, wrinkles, and discoloration while Beta Hydroxy and Salicylic Acid clears breakouts, blackheads, clogged pores and duals as an acne spot and cystic acne treatment serum for face. Niacinamide and Vitamin C work to lighten dark spots, reduce redness, and brighten overall complexion leaving you with radiant skin.

ANTI AGING SERUM - This daily anti wrinkle serum for face reduces the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, and pigmentation while defending against environmental aggressors visibly reducing uneven tone and texture for smooth youthful skin.
